title: Decorative, possibly hand-illustrated, biker style, tough looking font
content:
I have no idea where this one is from, or even if there's a font out there that shares similarities to this piece.

I figured the best course of action was to consult the usual experts here :)

Thanks in advance!

Trev

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type-sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112241/http:/typophile.com/files/type-sample.jpg) | 104.97 KB |
author: Trevor Curtis

comments.content: It's not the same, but I immediately thought of [MacBeth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112241/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/macbeth/?acs_p=1)
That's a pretty good start. thanks

well, having photographed the signs and lettering at disneyland ... extensively ... dot dot dot :D

[Ravenscroft](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112241/http:/mickeyavenue.com/fonts/ravenscroft/) is a bit closer, if not an exact match

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/raven_5662.jpg)
